name: Gift Set of 3 Shea Butter Soaps
description:
Gift set includes 3 of the following shea butter soap bars:

1.	LEMONGRASS COCONUT
2.	OATMEAL MILK & HONEY
3.	RED TEA GRAPEFRUIT
4.	ALMOND CHOCOLATE BISCOTTI
5.	VANILLA CHOCOLATE
6.	VANILLA ESPRESSO
7.	ALOE PATCHOULI YLANG YLANG
8.	WHITE GRAPEFRUIT
9.	EUCALYPTUS & SPIRULINA (BERGAMOT)
10.	FREE & CLEAR OATMEAL
11.	ORANGE CHAMOMILE
12.	INDIAN ROSE

The soap is handmade in New York from the best oils like shea, coconut, palm, olive oil and classic herbs and additives like oatmeal, lavender or rose petals. It is THE BEST GIFT EVER!!!

Also, the soap can help with minor skin problems. You do not need to use a lotion after shower with Soap NY bars since the skin will be much softer than you ever can expect.

Ingredients:  olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter, palm oil, lye, water, caster oil, essential/fragrance oil, herbs.

name: Vanilla Chocolate Shea Butter Soap
description:
It is favorite kind for those who like classics! Shea butter, coconut oil and olive oil cure your skin better than any lotion.

Ingredients:  olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter, palm oil, lye, water,vanilla fragrance oil, cocoa.

Size: ~ 6 oz

name: Oatmeal Milk & Honey Shea Butter Soap
description:
All time bestseller. The soap has classic smell with enhanced oils of shea, coconut and palm, with additives of oatmeal. It is an old fashioned handmade soap for the best skin treatment.
Ingredients: Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Chloride,  Aqua, Fragrance Oil, Oatmeal.

Ingredients: Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Oil, Sodium Chloride,  Aqua, 

Size: ~ 6 oz

name: Eucalyptus Spirulina Shea Butter Soap
description:
Seaweed soap with calming eucalyptus smell functions as a protective moisturizer and nutrient for your body. Some bars have additional bergamot essential oil.

Ingredients:  olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter, palm oil, lye, water, caster oil, eucalyptus essential oils, spirulina.

Size: ~ 6 oz

name: Lemongrass Coconut Shea Butter Soap
description:
These soap bars remind about great relaxing days under the sun on a beach! Lemongrass coconut soap not only protects your skin, but also refreshes all body and feelings!

Ingredients:  olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter, palm oil, lye, water, caster oil, lemongrass fragrance oil, cocount fragrance oil, yogi mint tea.

Size: ~ 6 oz
